rawHtml.value: HyperText Markup Language (HTML) is the standard markup language for creating web pages and web applications.

options.label: Raw HTML
options.description: Add a custom HTML code to the WordPress website via a raw code block that accepts HTML.

options.label: Extra class name
options.description: Add an extra class name to the element and refer to it from the custom CSS option.

options.label: Element ID
options.description: Apply a unique ID to the element to link it directly by using #your_id (for element ID use lowercase input only).
